title: amba nadu
sahitya:
amba nAdu vinnapamu vini nannAdarincuTa kiti samayamamma (amba)







anupallavi







ambuja pANi vANi marakatAngi madhura bhASani



shAmbhavi shashAnka vadanE shiva shankari tribhuvana sundari



jaga 



(damba)







caraNam 1







vArAhi vaiSnavi sumangali vAmini nigamAgama sancAriNi



shrI rAjarAjEshvari vimala chimayAnanda dAyini trijaga



(damba)







caraNam 2







shUlini purANi tritApa shamani sOma sUryAgni lOcani vara



pAlini natajana bhaya vidAriNi praNava panjara nivAsini jaga



(damba)







caraNam 3







caNDa mahiSAdi dAnava mada vibhanjani niranjani manOnmani



pANDava sahAyuDaina venkaTapati sahOdari trikUTa vAsini



(amba)
